Any good movie release should meet these simple requirements:

1) the original audio track (in its respective language)
2) mandatory English subtitle

These two very basic ingredients are all that`s needed for the majority of Internet users to enjoy the film. Dubbing in another language is crap, it should be forbidden. Hardsub - probably the stupidest, also a downgrade in quality. Also don`t bother with subtitles in your language, post those as a bonus. 
Since the uploader is taking the trouble to post a good upload (and consolidate his rep :D ), it`s only a minor additional effort for him/her to locate an English subtitle for that specific release.

I respect the languages of the world and their speakers but English is now the de facto standard on the Internet. Adhere to it and make the world a better place for sharing ^_^
